data.text: Go Mndewa Imulungu, ung'hombole na wanhu wehile,
Milimi yao oitenda mikali kamba zoka,
Go Mndewa Imulungu, unihonye na makono ga wanhu wehile,
Weli na kibuli wanitegela mitego kwa kifiso,
Go Mndewa Imulungu, nokulongela, “Gweye iyo Imulungu wangu.”
Go Mndewa Imulungu, Mndewa wangu, mkombola wangu mwene nguvu,
Go Mndewa Imulungu, sikuuwagwelele iwanhu wehile gaja gowosulukila,
Nojuwa kamba Mndewa Imulungu kowagombela wakiwa,
Kweli wene haki odigwaa nhogolwa twaga jako,
